# gamefabric_service_account_password (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "gamefabric_service_account" "example" {
  name = "my-service-account"
}

resource "gamefabric_service_account_password" "example" {
  service_account = gamefabric_service_account.example.name
}

output "password"  {
  value = nonsensitive(gamefabric_service_account_password.example.password)
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `service_account` (String) The name of the service account.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `password` (String, Sensitive) The password for the service account (write-only, only available on creation and updates).
